column4: News;Phnom Penh: A surprise occurred when a man who once owned a yellow Mini Cooper Phnom Penh  2AA 9558 found his stolen motor three years later in a garage on Street 211 and Street 336
column7: 2018.------After seeing his car and the car owner approached the police and filed a lawsuit. After receiving the complaint from the victim
column8: the Phnom Penh military police arrived at the garage. ------But by the new car owner
column10: so the car was taken away by cops to investigate the matter.------Rasmei News------
